tasks.name: Complete project proposal
tasks.description: Draft a proposal for the upcoming client meeting, including goals, scope, and timeline.

tasks.name: Review code
tasks.description: Review the pull request submitted by the frontend team for UI refactor.

tasks.name: Team Stand-up
tasks.description: Daily scrum meeting to discuss progress and blockers.

tasks.name: Update documentation
tasks.description: Revise the API documentation with the latest endpoints and examples.

tasks.name: Client demo preparation
tasks.description: Prepare assets, demo data, and script for the client walkthrough.

tasks.name: Security audit checklist
tasks.description: Create a checklist for security compliance and vulnerability testing.

tasks.name: Design feedback loop
tasks.description: Gather feedback from the design team and incorporate changes.
